SELECT p.id, p.title, (SELECT v.image_url FROM product_variants v WHERE v.product_id = p.id AND v.image_url IS NOT NULL LIMIT 1) as imageUrl, (SELECT MAX(publish_status) FROM product_shops WHERE product_id = p.id) as publishStatus, (SELECT MAX(last_export_time) FROM product_shops WHERE product_id = p.id) as lastExportTime, COUNT(v.id) as variantCount, SUM(CASE WHEN v.procurement_url IS NOT NULL AND v.procurement_price IS NOT NULL AND v.supplier IS NOT NULL AND v.sku IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as completeVariantCount FROM products p LEFT JOIN product_variants v ON p.id = v.product_id
AND (p.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM product_variants v2 WHERE v2.product_id = p.id AND v2.sku LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ))
AND p.id IN ( SELECT v3.product_id FROM product_variants v3 WHERE v3.product_id = p.id GROUP BY v3.product_id HAVING COUNT(*) = SUM(CASE WHEN v3.procurement_url IS NOT NULL AND v3.procurement_price IS NOT NULL AND v3.supplier IS NOT NULL AND v3.sku IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AND COUNT(*) > 0 )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM product_variants v4 WHERE v4.product_id = p.id AND (v4.procurement_url IS NOT NULL OR v4.procurement_price IS NOT NULL OR v4.supplier IS NOT NULL) ) AND p.id NOT IN ( SELECT v5.product_id FROM product_variants v5 WHERE v5.product_id = p.id GROUP BY v5.product_id HAVING COUNT(*) = SUM(CASE WHEN v5.procurement_url IS NOT NULL AND v5.procurement_price IS NOT NULL AND v5.supplier IS NOT NULL AND v5.sku IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM product_variants v6 WHERE v6.product_id = p.id AND (v6.procurement_url IS NOT NULL OR v6.procurement_price IS NOT NULL OR v6.supplier IS NOT NULL) )
AND (p.id NOT IN ( SELECT v7.product_id FROM product_variants v7 WHERE v7.product_id = p.id GROUP BY v7.product_id HAVING COUNT(*) = SUM(CASE WHEN v7.procurement_url IS NOT NULL AND v7.procurement_price IS NOT NULL AND v7.supplier IS NOT NULL AND v7.sku IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AND COUNT(*) > 0 ) OR NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM product_variants v8 WHERE v8.product_id = p.id))
GROUP BY p.id ORDER BY p.id DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p.id) FROM products p LEFT JOIN product_variants v ON p.id = v.product_id
AND (p.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM product_variants v2 WHERE v2.product_id = p.id AND v2.sku LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ))
AND p.id IN ( SELECT v3.product_id FROM product_variants v3 WHERE v3.product_id = p.id GROUP BY v3.product_id HAVING COUNT(*) = SUM(CASE WHEN v3.procurement_url IS NOT NULL AND v3.procurement_price IS NOT NULL AND v3.supplier IS NOT NULL AND v3.sku IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AND COUNT(*) > 0 )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM product_variants v4 WHERE v4.product_id = p.id AND (v4.procurement_url IS NOT NULL OR v4.procurement_price IS NOT NULL OR v4.supplier IS NOT NULL) ) AND p.id NOT IN ( SELECT v5.product_id FROM product_variants v5 WHERE v5.product_id = p.id GROUP BY v5.product_id HAVING COUNT(*) = SUM(CASE WHEN v5.procurement_url IS NOT NULL AND v5.procurement_price IS NOT NULL AND v5.supplier IS NOT NULL AND v5.sku IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM product_variants v6 WHERE v6.product_id = p.id AND (v6.procurement_url IS NOT NULL OR v6.procurement_price IS NOT NULL OR v6.supplier IS NOT NULL) )
AND (p.id NOT IN ( SELECT v7.product_id FROM product_variants v7 WHERE v7.product_id = p.id GROUP BY v7.product_id HAVING COUNT(*) = SUM(CASE WHEN v7.procurement_url IS NOT NULL AND v7.procurement_price IS NOT NULL AND v7.supplier IS NOT NULL AND v7.sku IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AND COUNT(*) > 0 ) OR NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM product_variants v8 WHERE v8.product_id = p.id))

SELECT COUNT(1) as totalCount, SUM(CASE WHEN is_complete = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as completeCount, SUM(CASE WHEN is_complete = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as incompleteCount FROM ( SELECT p.id, CASE WHEN COUNT(v.id) > 0 AND COUNT(v.id) = SUM( CASE WHEN v.procurement_url IS NOT NULL AND v.procurement_price IS NOT NULL AND v.supplier IS NOT NULL AND v.sku IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as is_complete FROM products p LEFT JOIN product_variants v ON p.id = v.product_id
AND (p.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM product_variants v2 WHERE v2.product_id = p.id AND v2.sku LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ))
GROUP BY p.id ) as product_stats
